statements: SELECT * FROM customer_segments;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_segments WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE group_id = 2 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customer_segments WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_segments WHERE group_id = 3 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE group_id = 2 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customer_segments;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_segments WHERE group_id = 3 ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT customer_id, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name FROM customer_segments WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
